replies.body:
did the post say 15/06? yes.
is today 15/05? yes
I think you can figure the rest out

I thought it said the 15th was just making sure.
Simple Y/N could have done it, no idea why everyone touchy of late.

But no one seems to be on, and if they are no one is in a premade.
So i thought maybe it got delayed or people are just lazy or have other commitments.
